meta.job_title: Senior Software Development Kit Product Manager

duties_responsibilities.duty: Leading and driving changes, improvements, and innovations in product design, features, and capabilities
Translating business objectives, user feedback, and client needs into impactful features
Synchronizing product features with company metrics and objectives
Partnering with engineering, design, customer success, business operations, and business development teams
Collaborating closely with the CTO and CEO to shape the strategic roadmap
